structure.unit: ARTICLE C. - USE OF SANITARY SEWER SYSTEM [4]

section.text: Composite Samples: All waste water composite samples shall be collected with a minimum of hourly aliquots or grabs for each hour that there is a discharge. All waste water composite samples shall be collected using flow proportional composite collection techniques, unless time-proportional composite sampling or grab sampling is authorized by the POTW Director. When authorizing time-proportional composites or grabs, the samples must be representative and the decision to allow the alternative sampling must be documented. (Ord. No. 2011-981, §1, 12-6-11)
